body:
Comment 2: 
This error message from WiX compiler(candle.exe) for Widows about version format

error CNDL0108 : The Product/@Version attribute's value, 'release.r60.3', is not a valid
version.  Legal version values  should look like 'x.x.x.x' where x is an integer from 0
to 65534.


Looks like I will have to make up the version as 60.3.10046 to auto insert a version
from src tree into msi package.
